Credentials to President of Presidium of SPA from Jordanian Ambassador
articles.content:
Credentials to President of Presidium of SPA from Jordanian Ambassador
    Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from newly appointed ambassador e.p. of Jordan to the DPRK Rajab M. Sukayri at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Dec. 22.
 Present there was Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kung Sok Ung.    
 After receiving the credentials, the president had a conversation with the ambassador.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il
    Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Jordanian King Abdullah II.
 New Jordanian Ambassador e.p. to the DPRK Rajab M. Sukayri today handed it to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK,.
